price: Ԑda a yεbԑdane wͻn anim abutu egya no mu no, wͻbεka sε: “Sε yɛhunui a anka yεyεε sotie maa Nyankopͻn san yεε sotie maa Ͻsomafoͻ no”.
arabic: يَوۡمَ تُقَلَّبُ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِي ٱلنَّارِ يَقُولُونَ يَٰلَيۡتَنَآ أَطَعۡنَا ٱللَّهَ وَأَطَعۡنَا ٱلرَّسُولَا۠

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yawma tuqallabu wujūhuhum fī al-nāri yaqūlūna yālaytanā aṭaʿnā al-laha wa-aṭaʿnā al-rasūlā
